Header: Dry weather conditions affect nearly 150,000 – DMC makes observations
Content: The Disaster Management Centre says  that close to 150,000 people have been severely affected by the inclement arid weather. The Assistant Director of the Disaster Management Centre Pradeep Kodippili said that the districts of Trincomalee, Polonnaruwa, Ampara, Kurunegala, Monaragala and Hambantota have been affected the most. Meanwhile, at a discussion held on Friday, President Maithripala Sirisena said that solutions must be provided to the issue of scarcity of drinking water, which encompass the entire country.
